translations: 讼棍；奸诈之徒（尤指政客）；不择手段的律师

sentences.sentence: Lafferty's longtime business partner, Allan Aitken, told me that he believed that "Biro was either a shyster or a con man, and had found in Lafferty an easy mark."
sentences.translation: 拉弗蒂的长期业务合作伙伴阿伦·艾特肯告诉我说，他认为“比罗既是个奸诈之徒也是个伪造犯，他发觉拉弗蒂是个很好骗的人。”
